ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the planned time poi
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the planned time point of the ECG measurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the time point labels for when the ECG test should be taken, if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EGTPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. See SDTMIG for additional information on representing time points. SDTMIG time point anchors EGTPTREF (text description) and EGRFTDTC (date/time) may be needed, as well as SDTMIG variables EGTPTNUM, EGELTM.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Planned time point are needed to differentiate multiple sequential assessments. It is recommended that time points should be pre-printed on the CRF rather than collected in a field that requires the site to enter text. If the form is laid out as a grid, then words such as Planned Time Point can be included as the column header.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-9 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.23.18
